title: DalioCoin
author: DalioCoin
content: $Dalio is a cryptocurrency built by its community that represents a price index of raw materials, including coffee, gold and corn and that can be modified in its basket as a result of governance. Each token represents a unit of the index, and fractions of it allow investors to participate in percentages of the commodities represented. In the initial construction of the project, 21% of the tokens will be released and the remaining 79% will only be released by staking out of a total supply of 500 million tokens, the construction of the project on the Algorand network guarantees fast transactions and low fees.
